requirement_text: Organizations must obtain consent when collecting personal information.
Personal information must be collected for appropriate purposes only.
Personal information must be protected by security safeguards.
Individuals have the right to access their personal information.
Personal information must be accurate, complete, and up-to-date.
Organizations must have policies to manage personal information.
Personal information must be retained only as long as necessary.
Organizations must provide recourse for individuals in case of complaints.
Personal information must not be disclosed without consent except as required by law.
Organizations must implement procedures to receive and respond to privacy breaches.
Personal information must be collected directly from the individual where possible.
Organizations must train employees on privacy policies and practices.
Organizations must designate an individual responsible for compliance.
Information must be protected against unauthorized access, collection, use, or disclosure.
Cross-border transfers must ensure equivalent levels of protection.
Consent must be meaningful and based on clear explanations.
Organizations must disclose their personal information management practices.
Personal information must not be used for purposes other than those identified.
Organizations must have mechanisms to correct personal information.
Security measures must be proportionate to the sensitivity of the information.
Privacy impact assessments should be conducted for new projects.
Individuals must be informed of the purposes for which information is collected.
Third-party service providers must be contractually obligated to protect personal information.
Organizations must ensure that personal information is protected during storage and transmission.
Privacy policies must be easily accessible to individuals.
Organizations must have procedures for responding to government requests for data.
Organizations must monitor and audit compliance with privacy policies.
Personal data collected must be limited to what is necessary.
Consent can be withdrawn at any time by the individual.
Organizations must keep records of consent and processing activities.
